CHAPTER 202 Codified Ordinances

202.01Designation; citation; headings.

202.02General definitions.

202.03Rules of construction.

202.04Revivor; effect of amendment or repeal.

202.05Construction of section references.

202.06Conflicting provisions.

202.07Determination of legislative intent.

202.08Severability.

202.99General penalty.

CROSS REFERENCES

See sectional histories for similar State law

Codification in book form - see Ohio R.C. 731.23

Imprisonment until fine and costs are paid - see Ohio R.C. 1905.30, 2947.14

Citation issuance for minor misdemeanors - see Ohio R.C. 2935.26 et seq.

Ordinances and resolutions - see ADM. Ch. 224

Statute of limitations on prosecutions - see GEN. OFF. 606.06
